articles.title: Know the Company : What is Addverb Technologies; Reliance Retail's latest acquirement - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The company that has just got Reliance Retail on board as their largest shareholder, saw its inception in 2016 when 5 former Asian Paints executives set out to transform the functioning of supply chain operations.

articles.title: Some SMS scam victims receive goodwill payments from OCBC but cannot disclose amounts - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): Two OCBC Bank customers who lost money in the recent spate of SMS scams have confirmed with The Straits Times that they have received goodwill payments from the bank.

articles.title: Brent oil hits highest level in more than 7 years - CNA
articles.description:
HONG KONG: Brent crude prices hit their highest level in more than seven years on Tuesday (Jan 18) on growing demand optimism, easing concerns about the Omicron COVID-19 variant and geopolitical tensions.
